Entities.Name: Primary Site
Entities.Definition: The anatomical origin of the cancer based on ICD-O-3 topography codes.

Entities.Name: Histological Grade
Entities.Definition: A qualitative assessment of tumor differentiation based on cellular morphology (G1 to G4).

Dataset.Name: SEER Cancer Pathology Reports
Dataset.Description: A dataset of 942 de-identified pathology reports used for primary site classification (12 ICD-O-3 codes for breast and lung cancers) and 645 reports used for histological grade classification (G1–G4). Sourced from SEER registries in 5 U.S. states.

AnnotationGuidelines.Description: Each pathology report was labeled by trained cancer registry experts following SEER ICD-O-3 and histological grading guidelines. Labels were derived from the 'Final Diagnosis' section only. No token-level entity annotations were used — the task was classification-based.
